pkgmetadata.longdescription: Ordinal Higher-Order Exploratory General Diagnostic Model for Polytomous Data // Perform a Bayesian estimation of the ordinal exploratory Higher-order General Diagnostic Model (OHOEGDM) for Polytomous Data described by Culpepper, S. A. and Balamuta, J. J. (2021) doi:10.1080/00273171.2021.1985949.
